body:
Use this service to upload and send an application to become a property and affairs deputy if you have a Payment By Account (PBA) number to pay for the application.

If you don't have a PBA number you can apply by post.

Sending an application takes around 5 minutes.

extraComponents.html:
### Before you start

You should read the guidance on how to [apply to become a court-appointed deputy](https://www.gov.uk/become-deputy/apply-deputy).

You'll need to complete the following forms:

* Application (COP1)
* Supporting information (COP1A)
* Assessment of capacity (COP3)
* Deputy's declaration (COP4)

You can type your signature on these forms instead of writing it by hand.

heading: Apply to become a property and financial affairs deputy
